long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform text effortlessly with 'convert2 case,' the must-have Chrome extension for text manipulation. Whether you need to make your text UPPERCASE, lowercase, Sentence case, or even CapITaliZed, this versatile tool has you covered. Say goodbye to extra spaces cluttering your content â€“ 'convert2 case' also tidies it up for you. Experience a smoother text editing experience with this essential extension, designed to save you time and effort.

UPPERCASE Conversion: Convert text to all capital letters.
lowercase Conversion: Transform text into all lowercase characters.
Sentence Conversion: Capitalize the first letter of each sentence.
Capitilize Conversion: Make the first letter of each word capitalized.
Remove Extra Spaces: Effortlessly clean up extra spaces and formatting in your text.
